text:
The place, date and time of meetings of the Task Force shall be prescribed by rule of the Task Force; provided, however that the Task Force shall hold regular meetings not less than once every month for a minimum of six months. Except as provided by law, all meetings of the Task Force shall be open to the public.
(Added by Ord. 102-12, File No. 120431, App. 6/22/2012, Eff. 7/22/2012)
